Description: Through manipulation of pressure, you are able to channel the force of wind to bind, weaken and crush your opponents.

Powers.DescLong: You launch a blast of debris accumulated within your cloud at a single target. This blast causes an initial burst of smashing damage, followed by lingering lethal damage. The force of the attack can also knock flying targets from the sky and inhibits the ability to jump.

Powers.DescShort: Ranged (Foe Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Powers.DescLong: You create a massive crash of thunder around a targeted foe. This sonic assault causes energy damage to affected targets and has a chance to stun all affected targets.

You release a debris cloud that descends upon a targeted foe. This foe, and all those in the affected area, suffer smashing damage as long as they remain within the debris column. Additionally, these targets suffer reduced chance to hit, resistance to damage and movement speed. Flying targets are knocked to the ground and unable to fly. You are only able to use this if the Pressure level of your creator is 3 or less.

As your creator manipulates pressure, this has an effect on you. The more pressure has been manipulated, the greater your chance of striking with critical damage. The trade-off, however, is that once pressure manipulation exceeds a certain point, you will be unable to use Hail of Debris.

You are naturally immune to smashing, lethal and psionic damage, and have moderate resistance to all other forms of damage. Healing is only half as effective on you as it would otherwise be. You are extremely resistant to mind affecting status effects, like Terrorize, Confuse, and Sleep, as well as most movement status effects, like Knock, Repel and Slow. You are only strongly resistant to Hold, Immobilize and Stun, however.

You are a vortex, and as such you create a constant whirlwind effect around yourself. Any foes that come near you will be struck by debris from your funnel cloud, suffering smashing damage. Visibility is also reduced, lowering the chance to hit of affected targets. Additionally, flying foes will be brought to the ground.
